title: (x) Infosys logo and headlines - Univers UltraCond, (similar to) Optima {Akira, Yves}
content:
Hey everyone,

can you help identify the fonts used on the Infosys ( [http://www.infosys.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013004601/http:/www.infosys.com/ "http://www.infosys.com/")) website for the headlines and the company logo?

I tried to put it into identifont but the closing thing it could come up with is Lucida Sans, which I guess looks like it except this font is much more narrow.

The logo font I have no idea because some of the letters connect with each other a little bit.
author: bobfet1

comments.content: wait I'm sorry... is that just arial narrow?
ah sweet that looks like it, thanks

Are you the same Akira who posts on MyFonts? If so, you are a genious by any fontlover's standards.

Cheers,  
Steve

Hi, Steve.

It’s me. A friend of yours, Akira.

I'd say the logo is custom designed, or at least customised from existing type. It shares some superficial similarities with [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013004601/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/optima_std_ot_virtual/), but that's about it.
